articles.description: Ben Affleck showed his full support for girlfriend Jennifer Lopez, brining his son Samuel and her daughter Emme to watch her accept the Icon Award at the 2022 iHeartRadio Awards.
articles.content:
Ben Affleck showed his full support for girlfriend Jennifer Lopez, brining his son Samuel and her daughter Emme to watch her accept the Icon Award at the 2022 iHeartRadio Awards.
